How to make simple server which can listen a network protocol and process it.

= Introduction =

In DLNA, there are many network listeners (so called, server).
So, we need to define the base structure of listener and processer for that. 

= Details =

Simply, if you want to make a server thread, you need 3 step process.

1. *Make your own network protocol listener.*
   Network protocol listener should be implemented with com.lgcns.sol.upnp.network.CommonListener.
   In this class, you should implement "listen" method.
   For more detail information, refer to the remark of CommonListener class.
